section1.title: LAST UPDATED: February 2025
section1.content: This License Agreement ("License") is a legal agreement between you (either an individual or a legal entity) and Giuseppe Rocco ("Licensor") for the use of the binary .xcframework known as VirtualizationKit or VZKit (the "Software"). By using, embedding, or otherwise utilizing the Software, you agree to be bound by the terms of this License.

You shall not modify, alter, disassemble, decompile, decrypt, or otherwise attempt to derive the source code of the Software. Any attempt to circumvent or interfere with any security measures or technical protections implemented by the Licensor within the .xcframework is strictly prohibited.

2.2 No Reverse Engineering
You shall not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Software or attempt to discover or use any underlying algorithms, methods, or techniques except as expressly allowed by applicable law (and only to the extent such law cannot be contractually waived).

2.3 No Redistribution or Re-marketing
You shall not redistribute, resell, sublicense, rent, lease, or re-market the Software, in whole or in part, as a standalone product or as part of any other framework, library, or offering that is designed to compete with or replace the Software. The Software is licensed for integration into your own software projects but not for independent redistribution.

2.4 Attribution Is Mandatory
Under no circumstances may you embed or use the Software in a project or product without providing attribution as specified in Section 1.2. Failure to properly credit the Licensor and Software is a direct violation of this License.

The Software, including all associated intellectual property rights, is owned and will remain the exclusive property of the Licensor. This License does not constitute a sale of the Software or any copy thereof.

3.2 Confidentiality

3.3 Source Code
The source code of the Software is proprietary and is not provided under this License. Unauthorized copying, modification, or distribution of the Software’s source code, via any medium, is strictly prohibited and may be subject to legal action.

section5.content:

Licensor may terminate this License immediately if you fail to comply with any term or condition herein. Upon termination, you must cease all use and destroy all copies of the Software in your possession or control.

4.2 Survival
Sections pertaining to confidentiality, restrictions on use, liability limitations, and disclaimers of warranty shall survive any termination of this License.

section6.content: THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. section9.title: AGREEMENT
section9.content: BY USING OR EMBEDDING THE SOFTWARE, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTOOD THIS LICENSE AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY ITS TERMS AND CONDITIONS.
